Introduction
This topic contains general guidance on evaluating musculoskeletal conditions, including
service connection (SC) for
fractures
, and
osteopenia
evaluating fibromyalgia
considering conflicting decisions regarding loss of use (LOU) of an extremity
applying the amputation rule
non-service-connected (NSC) amputation eliminating a distal service-connected (SC) disability
recognizing variations in musculoskeletal development and appearance
considering notable congenital or developmental defects
, and
changes in the rating schedule
.
title: M21-1, Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section F - Other Musculoskeletal Considerations
citation: Part V, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section F
